content: this legal document discusses the division of property between two individuals referred to as mrs pml and mrs pg the property in question includes two apartments located in a building in municipality numana the first apartment with six rooms is valued at €190000 while the second apartment with four rooms is valued at €150000 after considering these values there is a remaining balance of €20000 in favor of mrs pg the document states that mrs pg will receive this amount and mrs pml will cover the cost both parties agree to the property division and waive any potential legal mortgage
